CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Academy relative to Zenith Institute of Technology?
SRP.A: Meridian Academy is {above} Zenith Institute of Technology in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Celestial College relative to Silverhaven Polytechnic?
SRP.A: Celestial College is {below} Silverhaven Polytechnic in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Celestial College relative to Aethelgard School of Arts?
SRP.A: Celestial College is {below} Aethelgard School of Arts in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total student-teacher ratio?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Meridian Academy}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total student-teacher ratio?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Zenith Institute of Technology}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aethelgard School of Arts's minimum Student-Teacher Ratio in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aethelgard School of Arts's minimum Student-Teacher Ratio is in {1966}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Borealis Graduate School's maximum Student-Teacher Ratio in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Borealis Graduate School's maximum Student-Teacher Ratio is in {1994}.

NC.Q: Between 1975 and 1990, was the average total Student-Teacher Ratio higher or lower than between 1985 and 1995?
NC.A: The average total student-teacher ratio between 1975 and 1990 was {lower} than between 1985 and 1995.

NC.Q: Was the total Student-Teacher Ratio in 1976 higher or lower than in 1990?
NC.A: The total student-teacher ratio in 1976 was {lower} than in 1990.

NC.Q: Was the total Student-Teacher Ratio in 1981 higher or lower than in 1991?
NC.A: The total student-teacher ratio in 1981 was {lower} than in 1991.

NC.Q: Was the total Student-Teacher Ratio in 1986 higher or lower than in 1991?
NC.A: The total student-teacher ratio in 1986 was {lower} than in 1991.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Meridian Academy} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Borealis Graduate School and Celestial College first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Borealis Graduate School and Celestial College first exchanged leading positions in {1968}.
